structures.description: The remains of the first Leviathan to dream in the deep. An entire ecosystem lives in its bones.
A research station that went too deep. Their last transmissions speak of songs.
Built by creatures who worship the glow. Every surface pulses with living light.
Life thrives here without sunlight, feeding on the heat of the world's core
Where a leviathan fell, an entire civilization grew. They never knew the sun.
Beyond this point, even light cannot survive. What lives below has never been seen.
Where the creatures of the deep gather to sing. The walls record every note.
Coral that grows memories instead of calcium. Touch it to experience the ocean's history.

agents.name: The Watcher in the Dark
dialogue: I have guarded the First Dreamer for longer than stars have names.
In the dark, focus becomes a lighthouse. I see every mind that glows.
The surface dwellers fear the deep. They do not understand: the deep is where clarity lives.
Pressure forces truth. Down here, there is no room for distraction.
The First Dreamer still dreams. I hear the dreams. Would you like to listen?

agents.name: Dr. Elara Vance
dialogue: We came to study the songs. The songs the creatures sing in the dark.
Day 47: The songs are not random. They are... equations. Temporal equations.
Day 89: We can hear the Leviathan dreaming. It dreams of focus. It dreams of us.
Day 127: They're coming up from below. They want to teach us something.
I never left. I became part of the research. Would you like to see our findings?

agents.name: Lumina
dialogue: The Light! The beautiful, impossible Light! In all this darkness, we GLOW!
Every photon is a prayer. Every bioluminescent pulse is a miracle.
The surface has too much light. It blinds them to what matters.
Down here, every spark of illumination is precious. Including YOU.
Your focus glows, did you know? I can see your thoughts. They're beautiful.

agents.name: The Weight
dialogue: I am the weight of all the water above. I am what crushes the unfocused.
Only those who can concentrate survive the deepest places.
The gate opens for the worthy. The unworthy... become part of the depth.
What lies below has never seen light. It has never needed to.
Are you ready to be compressed into your truest self?

agents.name: Echo
dialogue: I remember every song ever sung in the deep. Every whale's lament. Every creature's cry.
The First Dreamer taught us to sing. Before that, we only screamed.
Songs travel farther than light down here. I hear songs from before the world was born.
Would you like to add your voice? Your focused intention? The ocean remembers forever.
The song we're all singing, together, across millennia... it's almost complete.

interactables.description: A deep-sea organism that glows when touched. Your touch changes its color.
Formed over millennia by crushing pressure. Contains the essence of depth.
A fragment of the First Dreamer's skeleton. Hold it to share in its dreams.
Deep within the Dreamer's ribcage. Your focus feeds its eternal dream.
Add your voice to the eternal song of the deep.
Touch to experience a random memory from the ocean's billion-year history.
Bathe in the vent's heat. Survive, and emerge transformed.
Peer into the abyss. Warning: The abyss peers back.

chapters.name: The First Dreamer
fragments: Before there were stars, there was the ocean. And in the ocean, there was the First.
It was not the largest. It was not the oldest. But it was the first to dream.
Its dreams rippled through the water. Other creatures began to dream too.
When it finally slept forever, its dreams became the foundation of all deep thought.

chapters.name: The Light Bearers
fragments: In the deepest dark, something impossible happened.
Creatures learned to make their own light. To glow against the void.
They discovered that light was not just illumination. It was communication.
And focused light—concentrated intention—could pierce even the deepest darkness.

chapters.name: The Song
fragments: Sound travels forever in water. Every whale song ever sung still echoes.
The creatures of the deep discovered the pattern. The frequency that unlocks focus.
They have been singing it for a million years. Building it note by note.
The song is almost complete. When it finishes, the First Dreamer will wake.
What do you think it will dream then?

chapters.name: The Deepest Place
fragments: Below the abyss, there is another abyss. And below that, another.
At the very bottom—if there is a bottom—something waits.
Not dead. Not alive. Something else. Something that has never known light.
It does not dream. It does not sing. It only... focuses.
The entire ocean is its meditation.

evolutionStages.effect: Bioluminescent creatures begin following you like a glowing entourage
You can understand the songs of the deep—they speak of you
The pressure no longer hurts. It feels like an embrace
The First Dreamer's dreams include you now
The pressure gate opens. You may descend to the deepest place
THE SONG COMPLETES. THE FIRST DREAMER STIRS. IT DREAMS OF YOU.
